Capsule8 | Backend Developer | Node, Postgres | ONSITE: Brooklyn, NY | Full Time

Capsule8 is building the industryâ€™s only real-time attack disruption platform purpose built for the cloud-native world of Linux, containers and microservices. Capsule8 automates the detection, isolation, and shut down of attacks in the instant they happen.

The position is on the app team; we're building the business logic server and user-facing frontend. The server is Node/Postgres (REST over HTTP(2) + WS) and the frontend is Typescript/React. Ideal candidates have 5-10 years of professional experience building and maintaining web backends.

Our team interfaces with a gRPC bus (written in Go, using NATS/STAN) that connects our Linux agents (open-source, written in Go [1]) to our analytics (written in Go). The entire product is deployed on prem.

We just signed a prominent deal with Lyft that you can read about here [0] and we've got a number of other deployments underway. :)

I lead the app team; email me at phil@capsule8.com if you'd like to chat!
